original_text: Laban said to him, ‘The Lord has blessed you! You should not continue to stand out here. Come with me. I have prepared a room for you in my house. There is also a place for your camels.’
korean_text: 라반이 이르되 여호와께 복을 받은 자여 들어오소서 어찌 밖에 서 있나이까 내가 방과 낙타의 처소를 준비하였나이다

sentences.original_text: You should not continue to stand out here
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 여기 계속 서서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: I have prepared a room for you
There is also a place for your camels
